com.fsc.cicerone

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fsc.cicerone.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    An entity class that stores the data of a user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User()
      Default empty constructor.
      User(org.json.JSONObject user)
      Create a new User object based on a JSON Object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User()
        Default empty constructor.

      • User

        public User(org.json.JSONObject user)
        Create a new User object based on a JSON Object. The JSON Object must contain at least the following values: 
         
 {
     "username": "test",
     "tax_code": "testtaxcode",
     "name": "Nome",
     "surname": "Cognome",
     "password": "password",
     "email": "email@email.com",
     "user_type": "1",
     "cellphone": "0123456789",
     "birth_date": "2010-01-20",
     "sex": "male"
 }
        Parameters:
        user - The JSON object from which data will be fetched.

      • validateUsername

        public static boolean validateUsername(java.lang.String usernameInput)
        A function that validates a username. Check that the username is correctly formatted.
        Parameters:
        usernameInput - The username to check.
        Returns:
        True if username is valid. False if isn't.

        A function that validates a email. Check that the email is correctly formatted.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if email is valid. False if isn't.
